channel.title: Spring on GitOrko
channel.description: Recent content in Spring on GitOrko

item.title: Spring Boot - Traefik (Rate Limit)
item.description: Spring Boot application deployed on kubernetes, configured with Traefik ingress controller to rate limit.

item.title: Spring Boot - ReactJS
item.description: Spring Boot web application with reactjs and JWT authentication support, uses bootstrap and google chart.

item.title: Spring Webflux & Angular
item.description: Spring Reactive web application with angular clarity and & reactive mongo db.

item.title: Spring Reactor - Basics
item.description: Reactive programming examples on how to use spring reactor.

item.title: Spring Boot - Angular
item.description: Spring boot web application with angular and JWT authentication support, uses clarity for UI components and chart.js for rendering charts.

item.title: Spring Boot - Thymeleaf
item.description: Spring MVC application with Thymeleaf template & basic spring security support, uses bootstrap for CSS and chart.js for rendering charts.

item.title: Spring Boot - QueryDSL
item.description: Spring Boot QueryDSL lets you query the database using domain specific language similar to SQL.

item.title: Spring Events
item.description: Spring events provides event handling mechanism in spring

item.title: Spring Cloud Sleuth & Zipkin
item.description: Spring cloud sleuth helps you trace a request and zipkin server help you trace in a distributed environment.

item.title: Spring JPA N+1
item.description: The N+1 query problem occurs when the framework executes N additional SQL statements to fetch the same data that could have been retrieved when executing the primary SQL query.

item.title: Spring Webflux & Reactive JDBC
item.description: Webflux integration with reactive JDBC, to allow non-blocking calls to database.
